thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 43 of 602
thread.title: Carrie Graf

author: Carrie Graf
title: Carrie Graf
text: I had trouble logging into my account, i couldnt log into my email i had on file to reset my password, the customer service rep was very patient, kind, helpful. I unfortunately do not remember her name, but she was able to reset my email and password on her end, stayed on the phone with me until i was able to log onto my account from one of my devices at home. I am always very happy with everyone i speak with at Fabletics.
